subject: Automobile Racing
Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Tony Kanaan, a former IndyCar Series champion, overcame a second crash in less than 24 hours to qualify for the Indianapolis 500 on Sunday.
snippet: Tony Kanaan, a former IndyCar Series champion, overcame a second crash in less than 24 hours to qualify for the Indianapolis 500 on Sunday.
